title: Bag
medium:
Medium: silk and metal-wrapped silk on linen
Technique: embroidery using cross, half-cross, back and eyelet stitches in silk; buttonhole, plaited braid, looping and knotted stitches using metal-wrapped silk on plain weave
description: Three panels plus base, each with a different pattern, sewn together. Extended dark yellow silk lining functions with a drawstring as a closure.
name: Bag
